text: Ceratias is a genus of anglerfish in the family Ceratiidae. == Species == * Ceratias holboelli Krøyer, 1845 (Krøyer's deep sea angler fish) * Ceratias tentaculatus Norman, 1930 (southern seadevil) * Ceratias uranoscopus J. Murray, 1877 (stargazing seadevil) == References == Category:Ray-finned fish Category:Teleosts Category:Bioluminescent animals
title: Ceratias
